directions: Combine all the ingredients in a large bowl and stir thoroughly to distribute the ingredients well. Season to taste with more chile, lemon juice, or salt, if you want. I like to let the salsa sit for at least 30 minutes before serving.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons plus 1 teaspoon freshly squeezed lemon juice, or more to taste
1 1/2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh serrano or jalapeño chiles (including seeds), or more to taste
title: Pico de Gallo with Lemon Zest (_Pico de gallo con limón amarillo_)
